nodes.text: The Dwartii were a social group that inhabited the galaxy. Supreme Leader Snoke of the First Order had a ring that had gold etched with the glyphs of the Dwartii. They also shared their name with the planet Dwartii.

The Dwartii were first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo and published on December 17, 2017. When asked on Twitter, Lucasfilm Story Group member Matt Martin said he assumed the book's mention of "the Dwartii" referred to the Four Sages of Dwartii.
